content: If you are trying to connect to CareEvolution let me know after you register your client- there is a bug in the self registration and so I have to fix the registration on the server. Apologies
HI Michele, I've self registered and I'm now getting an invalid client error. Is that expected due to the above issue?

Hi Michelle - I registered an app a couple of days ago and am able to auth without issues right now. Is there anything you guys you need to do? I'm assuming not since it works for me but figured I'd ask.

Hi @Michele Mottini We’re working on adding support for Blue Button to CommonHealth and we’d like to try integrating with your sandbox if that's possible. Our redirect url is: https://appdev.tcpdev.org/m/phr/oauth/redirect

Please let me know if you need any additional information.
@James Kizer you appear to be already registered with client id 5cc63ac9-f175-47eb-ab1b-5515d66894b3
Oh sorry, did not see your previous message
@Michele Mottini getting the following when performing the initial auth request Screenshot_1605799780.png
openid scope was not accepted - try now
Keep using what you were using - I fixed the server config to accept openid
the app self registration is buggy and does not set the allowed scopes - you are doing nothing wrong!
Sorry, but I'm still getting the same error
It was offline_access this time. Added it
(although you are registered as a public client so offline_access would not really work)
Thanks @Michele Mottini, all looks good! I was able to authenticate and fetch data
@Ian King sorry, I missed your message yesterday as well - are you all set? What is your app name?
